snippet: Federal authorities arrested a 19-year-old Minneapolis man who they said had threatened to kill F.B.I. agents after another Minnesota resident was charged with trying to join the Islamic State.
abstract: Federal authorities arrest Khaalid A Abdulkadir in Minnesota after he threatens in Twitter post to kill FBI agents; post comes after agents arrest Abdirizak M Warsame on charges of trying to join Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities arrested a 19-year-old Minneapolis man who they said had threatened to kill F.B.I. agents after another Minnesota resident was charged with trying to join the Islamic State.

headline.main: Minnesota: Man Is Accused of Making Death Threats to F.B.I. Agents
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Man Is Accused of Making Death Threats to F.B.I. Agents

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
